exam.question: All the key words in the article are printed in _______ type so as to attract readers’ attention.

answer.explain: in bold type：  粗体字。句意：  文章中的所有关键字都是用粗体印刷， 以便吸引读者的注意力。dark：  黑暗的， 昏暗的； dense：  密集的， 浓厚的； black：  黑色的； 忧郁的。

sentences.sContent: You should be feeling confident and bold when you meet your bank manager.
sentences.sCn: 你会见银行经理的时候要大胆自信。

sentences.sContent: She marched into his office as bold as brass (=  very confident and not showing enough respect  ) .
sentences.sCn: 她放肆地直闯进他的办公室。

sentences.sContent: ...she knew she had to make a bold move to fully commit to her new future...

synos.tran: 大胆的，英勇的；[印刷]黑体的；厚颜无耻的；险峻的

remMethod.val: b ＋ old (年长的) → 年长的人通常不会太鲁莽 → 鲁莽的

trans.tranCn: 勇敢的； 鲁莽的； 粗体的， 黑体的； 醒目的
trans.tranOther: so confident or determined that you sometimes offend people
